resources.string: Designed with highest security standard.\n Easily import & export accounts from other\n wallet apps.
Swap between arbitrary token pair.\nNo deposit needed.
Easy to manage your profile and unlock other features. \nStraight from the app.
Swap at your target price, fully control of your funds, low fees, seamless UX
This creates a new Ethereum wallet for you to receive and transfer tokens.
Your backup words are incorrect.\n Please try again.
You entered the wrong backup words for another time. Want to backup again?
We will give you a list of 12 random words. Please
to restore your Kyber Wallet if you lose your phone or forget your password.
We will give you a list of 12 random words. Please write down on paper and keep safe. This paper is the only way to restore your Kyber Wallet if you lose your phone or forget your password.
To make sure you have written down all of your backup words. Please enter the following:
You have successfully imported a wallet

Your transaction will be broadcasted when rate of %s (for %s)
Don’t worry. You will not be charged now. You pay fees only when transaction is executed (broadcasted & mined).
Your order can not be submited because your WETH is not enough, please convert ETH to WETH.

Photo of your Document - Front Side
Photo of your Document - Back Side
Residential Address Street address, P.O. box, apartment, suite, unit, building, floor,…
Document must display your name and current residential address in 6 months
Acceptable Proof of Address / Document Types
Please indicate your country of Tax Residency - Optional
We are collecting this information in compliance with the relevant tax regulations. Help us ensure the information is accurate and up to date
Tips on How your Document should look
Must show all 4 corners of the card
Must not be covered in anyway
Please hold the Passport/ID/Driving License in your hand next to your face.
Your face and the Passport/ID must be clearly visible and any text, numbers or photos on the passport must be readable and not covered by your fingers.

Please indicate below the primary professional activity that generate the funds that will be transferred into the wallet. Filling up this field will help us better understand your primary professional activity.
Both capital or small letters work fine
You are swapping to receive a gift

Please sign in to use Price Alert feature

We are aware of the revised Advisory Guidelines on the PDPA for NRIC and other National Identification Numbers that Personal Data Protection Commission (PDPA) issued on 31 August 2018.

We seek your understanding that we are continuing with the collection and use of NRIC Numbers / Foreign Identification Numbers / Birth Certificate Numbers / Work Permit Numbers / Passport Numbers to ensure that KyberSwap does not deal with assets or funds that are proceeds of drug dealing, criminal conduct or property relating to money laundering or terrorism financing offence.

We assure you that we will undertake proper safeguarding measures to protect your personal data (including NRIC Numbers / FIN / Birth Certificate Numbers / Work Permit Numbers / Passport Numbers) under our care.

Contact us at support@kyberswap.com should you have any queries or concerns.
Your transaction %s might be lost, please check Etherscan for more information

Can not connect to your wallet, please make sure the QR code is valid and try again

On Jan 24, 2020, KyberSwap.com and- related interfaces (the “Platform”) will no longer be operated by Kyber Network International Limited (“Kyber Network”) and will be operated by KYRD International Limited (“KYRD International”), a sister company incorporated and based in the British Virgin Islands (“BVI”). There are no other changes apart from the new operating entity of KyberSwap.com being changed to KYRD International.

KYRD International is a company in BVI and as such, the country is not subject to an adequacy decision by the EU Commission on the processing of personal data. If you wish to continue using KyberSwap.com without providing personal data again, Kyber Network will transfer your current personal data to KYRD International upon your explicit consent. Please rest assured that KYRD International respects your privacy and is committed to protecting your personal data. For questions, please email support@kyberswap.com or reach out to us at https://t.me/kyberswapofficial

Kindly select:

  • \t“Yes” if you wish to allow KyberSwap.com to copy your personal data to KYRD International; or
  • \t“No” if you do not wish to copy your personal data to KYRD International. Note that if you click “No”, your personal data shall be erased in accordance with the retention periods specified in Kyber Network’s Privacy Policy. You will have to create a new profile on KyberSwap.com in order to, but not limited to, access Limit Orders, price alerts, personalized notifications and other benefits.
Thank you, your profile will be securely copied. No further action needed from you.
Ahh, Your profile will not be copied. You would have to create a new profile to use some services like Limit order, alerts, notifications etc. Do you want to continues?
Your gas price must be 10% higher than the current gas price
Can not speed up the transaction
Submitting this attempt does not guarantee your original transaction will be cancelled. If the cancellation attempt is successful, you will be charged the transaction fee above.
Your transaction has been cancelled successfully
Do you want to delete all triggered alerts?
KyberCode requires correct time to verify. Please go to setting menu on your mobile device and switch Date and Time to Automatic mode
Limit order is non-custodial, which means %s will remain in your wallet till %s price reaches %s
Select a higher gas fee to accelerate the processing of your transaction

Please wait for expected rate to be updated
⚠️NEVER share your private key with anyone (including KyberSwap). Your private key grants access to all your funds and they may get stolen.
⚠️NEVER share your mnemonic with anyone (including KyberSwap). Your mnemonic grants access to all your funds and they may get stolen.
⚠️NEVER share your keystore with anyone (including KyberSwap). Your keystore grants access to all your funds and they may get stolen.
